name: The Spire 2: Celestial, The Sky Torn Asunder
description: REALLY REALLY IMPORTANT NOTES YOU NEED TO READ!!! - You need GOTHICTX.WAD to run this map! Links to download it are at the end of the text file. - This map is ENORMOUS. If you have anything less than a 1Ghz processor, don't even bother. - This is probably the hardest map ever made that isn't nuts.wad, with well over 3000 monsters on UV. That being said, I would highly recommend HMP difficulty for most players, as that is more equal to normal UV difficulties.
